name: Camp Raid
description:
You are a solider inside a tank! Your camp has been attacked and you must retaliate by taking down the enemy forces! Have fun!

Controlls

In the game you can SHOOT ENEMIES!!

Movement W, A, S, D and / or  arrow keys.  ShootingA button in UI
Ending a turnA button in UI Friday Night Game Jam

This game was made for a game jam, where you have to make a game in 3 hours. The 3-hours contain the actual development, but not the planning. 

In this jam we had to use a specific assetpack, I made some changes to the assetpack. Only changing the colors (for example transparency.) to enhance the experience.

Pixel Shmup by Kenney
